history.proof: strivial use: cprv_red, PCP_facts.stack_enum, not_decidable unfold: cprv, UA, FOL_prv_class.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite valid_undec, prv_undec, satis_undec, prv_unenum, valid_unenum in contra.
exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros H contra. unfold decidable, cprv in contra. rewrite valid_undec, prv_undec, satis_undec, prv_unenum, valid_unenum in contra. apply (not_decidable _ _ _ _ H) in contra. destruct contra as [contra _]. apply contra.
